article.title: Lockheed to Support Vehicle Optical Surveillance Program
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Gyrocam Systems Limited Liability Corporation, Sarasota, Florida, is being awarded $9,539,083 for delivery order #0002 under a previously awarded firm-fixed-price, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity (M67854-12-D-5504) to provide field service representatives in support of the vehicle optic surveillance system program.Â Marine Corps Systems Command, Quantico, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
